subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After eight days of upheaval, drama, injuries and controversy, and a blur of defeats, the Knicks eased their psyches Saturday night the only way they know how: with a giddy, unbridled scoring binge.
snippet: After eight days of upheaval, drama, injuries and controversy, and a blur of defeats, the Knicks eased their psyches Saturday night the only way they know how: with a giddy, unbridled scoring binge.
